sentences.english: Objective To investigate the projection from the vestibular nuclei to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠前庭神经核群向脊髓的投射纤维特征。

sentences.english: Polio eradication is one of our most important areas of unfinished business.
sentences.chinese: 根除脊髓灰质炎是我们未完成工作的最重要领域之一。

sentences.english: The blunt ending of the cord is due to hypoplasia of the distal spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓末端圆钝是由于末梢脊髓发育不良。

sentences.english: The blunt ending of the cord is due to hypoplasia of the distal spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓末端圆钝是由于末梢脊髓发育不良。

sentences.english: V. , or bivalent oral polio vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 双价口服脊髓灰质炎疫苗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the migration, effect on axon growth of olfactory ensheathing cells (OECs) transplanted in contused spinal cord of rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的明确移植的嗅鞘细胞在脊髓内的迁移特点。

sentences.english: There is no decussation in the lateral corticospinal tract after the decussation at the medullary pyramids.
sentences.chinese: 它们在髓状锥体交叉后，不会在皮层脊髓侧束中交叉。

sentences.english: The new formulation is known as B. O. P. V. , or bivalent oral polio vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 新的形式是众所周知的双价口服脊髓灰质炎疫苗。

sentences.english: It is thinnest at the top; this thin area is located just below the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 其最薄处为顶端部分，刚好位于脊髓之下。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the experience of nursing autonomic dysreflexia followed by spinal injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结脊髓损伤后自主神经反射异常的护理经验。

sentences.english: Reevaluation of Gray and White Matter Injury after Spinal Cord Ischemia in Rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 对于兔脊髓缺血后灰质和白质损伤的重新评价。

sentences.english: Analgesic Effects of Gabapentin after Spinal Surgery.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓手术后卡巴贲丁的镇痛作用。

sentences.english: Digital subtraction angiography showed an abnormal blood supply from the posterior spinal branch of the left T9 artery.
sentences.chinese: 数字减影血管造影术显示T9左后侧脊髓支血供异常。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic efficacy of microsurgery on tethered cord syndrome(TCS) in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究显微手术治疗儿童脊髓拴系综合征的疗效。

sentences.english: Cerebrospinal fluid studies showed lymphocytes predominant with marked elevated protein concentration.
sentences.chinese: 脑脊髓液显示淋巴球居多，伴随蛋白质浓度升高。

sentences.english: How beneficial is surgery for cervical radiculopathy and myelopathy?
sentences.chinese: 颈椎神经根病变和脊髓病变的手术有多大益处？

definition: medulla oblongata (the lower half of the brainstem)
axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
